content:
Hi
I've been intending to get involved with development of Rust in quite a while, but previous times I've tried, I haven't been able to figure out somewhere I could help.
I just saw the article about the compiler team asking and getting more people to join, and noticed the Meta meeting in the calendar is soon, so I thought I'd attempt to get involved again. Besides my easter vacation just started, so I have some free time to spend on it too.
Hello Alice! I just joined as well and for the same reason - after reading @nikomatsakis 's blog. :smile:
